wrap.desc: The precursor to Pigs in a Blanket.

wingfangchu.desc: A savory dish of alien wing wang in soy. Wait, what?

warmdonkpocket_weak.desc: The food of choice for the seasoned traitor. This one is lukewarm.

warmdonkpocket.desc: The food of choice for the seasoned traitor.
warmdonkpocket.name: warm Donk-pocket

wafflecone.name: ice cream in a waffle cone

vegetablepizzaslice.desc: A slice of the most green pizza of all pizzas not containing green ingredients.
vegetablepizzaslice.name: vegetable pizza slice

twobread.desc: It is very bitter and winy.

twimsts.desc: Sweet twisted sticks made of liquorice, can be used to make edible handcuffs!

turkeyslice.desc: A serving of some tender and delicious turkey.

tofurkey.desc: A fake turkey made from tofu.

tofu.desc: Making this should probably be a criminal offense.

toastedsandwich.desc: Now if you only had a pepper bar.
toastedsandwich.name: toasted sandwich

telebacon.desc: It tastes a little odd but it's still delicious.
telebacon.name: tele bacon

tatortot.desc: A large fried potato nugget that may or may not try to valid you.
tatortot.name: tator tot

tastybread.desc: Bread in a tube. Chewy and surprisingly tasty.
tastybread.name: bread tube

syntikebab.desc: Delicious synthetic meat, on a stick.
syntikebab.name: synthimeat-kebab

syndidonkpocket.desc: This donk-pocket is emitting a small amount of heat.
syndidonkpocket.name: Donk-pocket

syndicake.desc: An extremely moist snack cake that tastes just as good after being nuked.
syndicake.name: Syndi-Cakes

sushi_Unagi.desc: A simple sushi consisting of eel and rice.

sushi_TobikoEgg.desc: A sushi consisting of shark roe and an egg.

sushi_Tobiko.name: tobiko sushi

sushi_Tamago.desc: A simple sushi consisting of egg and rice.

sushi_Sake.desc: A simple sushi consisting of raw salmon and rice.

sushi_Masago.desc: A simple sushi consisting of goldfish roe.
sushi_Masago.name: masago sushi

sushi_Ikura.desc: A simple sushi consisting of salmon roe.
sushi_Ikura.name: ikura sushi

sugarcookie.desc: Just like your little sister used to make.
sugarcookie.name: sugar cookie

stuffing.desc: Moist, peppery breadcrumbs for filling the body cavities of dead birds. Dig in!

stroopwafel.desc: Straight from the snack factories of Space Den Haag comes a classic dutch treat!

spidermeatbreadslice.desc: A slice of meatloaf made from an animal that most likely still wants you dead.
spidermeatbreadslice.name: spider meat bread slice

spacylibertyduff.desc: Jello gelatin, from Alfred Hubbard's cookbook.

soydope.desc: Like regular dope, but for the health conscious consumer.

zurek.desc: A traditional Polish soup composed of vegetables, meat, and an egg. Goes great with bread.

tomatosoup.desc: Drinking this feels like being a vampire! A tomato vampire...

sweetpotatosoup.desc: Delicious sweet potato in soup form.

stew.desc: A nice and warm stew. Healthy and strong.
stew.name: stew

slimesoup.desc: If no water is available, you may substitute tears.

mushroomsoup.desc: A delicious and hearty mushroom soup.

frenchonionsoup.desc: Good enough to make a grown mime cry.
frenchonionsoup.name: french onion soup

cullenskink.desc: A thick Scottish soup made of smoked fish, potatoes and onions.
cullenskink.name: cullen skink

cornchowder.desc: A creamy bowl of corn chowder, with bacon bits and mixed vegetables. One bowl is never enough.
cornchowder.name: corn chowder

coldchili.desc: This slush is barely a liquid!

clownchili.desc: A delicious stew of meat, chiles, and salty, salty clown tears.

chicken_noodle_soup.desc: A hearty bowl of chicken noodle soup, perfect for when you're stuck at home and sick.
chicken_noodle_soup.name: chicken noodle soup

beetsoup.desc: Wait, how do you spell it again..?

beanstew.desc: A spicy bean stew with lots of veggies, commonly served aboard the fleet as a filling and satisfying meal with rice or bread.
beanstew.name: Prickeldröndolhaskl

healthy.desc: homemade raisins, the best in all of spess.

sosjerky.desc: Beef jerky made from the finest space cows.

xenomeatbread.desc: The culinary base of every self-respecting eloquent gentleman. Extra Heretical.
xenomeatbread.name: xenomeatbread loaf

turkey.desc: A traditional turkey served with stuffing.
turkey.name: turkey

tofubread.desc: Like meatbread but for vegetarians. Not guaranteed to give superpowers.

spidermeatbread.desc: Reassuringly green meatloaf made from spider meat.
spidermeatbread.name: spider meat loaf

pumpkinpie.desc: A delicious treat for the autumn months.

plaincake.desc: A plain cake, not a lie.
plaincake.name: vanilla cake

donkpocketpizza.desc: Who thought this would be a good idea?

cheesewheel.desc: A big wheel of delicious Cheddar.

carrotcake.desc: A favorite desert of a certain wascally wabbit. Not a lie.

valid.desc: It's just an herb salad with meatballs and fried potato slices. Nothing suspicious about it.

potato.desc: Boil 'em! Mash 'em! Stick 'em in a stew!

melonfruitbowl.desc: For people who wants edible fruit bowls.
melonfruitbowl.name: melon fruit bowl

kale.desc: A healthy kale salad drizzled in oil, perfect for warm summer months.

herb.desc: A tasty salad with apples on top.
herb.name: herb salad

greek.desc: A popular salad made of tomatoes, onions, feta cheese, and olives all drizzled in olive oil. Though it feels like it's missing something...

aesir.desc: Probably too incredible for mortal men to fully enjoy.

rawcutlet.desc: A thin strip of raw meat.

chocochips.desc: Ready for oven! They have little pieces of chocolate all over them

raw_bacon.desc: God's gift to man in uncooked form.
raw_bacon.name: raw bacon

pumpkinpieslice.desc: A slice of pumpkin pie, with whipped cream on top. Perfection.
pumpkinpieslice.name: pumpkin pie slice

popcorn.desc: A candy bean, guaranteed to not give you gas. It's popcorn flavored!
popcorn.name: popcorn jelly bean

plaincakeslice.desc: Just a slice of cake, it is enough for everyone.

pistachios.desc: Deliciously salted pistachios. A perfectly valid choice...

peanut_butter_jelly.desc: A classic PB&J sandwich, just like your mom used to make.

choc_chip_pancake.name: choc-chip pancake

orangecakeslice.desc: Just a slice of cake, it is enough for everyone.

red.desc: Perfect for hiding the fact that it's burnt to a crisp.

notasandwich.desc: Something seems to be wrong with this, you can't quite figure what. Maybe it's his moustache.

no_raisin.desc: Best raisins in the universe. Not sure why.

mushroompizzaslice.desc: Maybe it is the last slice of pizza in your life.

muffin.desc: A delicious and spongy little cake.
muffin.name: muffin

xenomeat.desc: A slab of meat. It's green!

spidermeat.desc: A slab of spider meat. Not very appetizing.

spiderleg.desc: A still twitching leg of a giant spider. You don't really want to eat this, do you?

spidereggs.desc: A cluster of juicy spider eggs. A great side dish for when you don't care about your health.
spidereggs.name: spider eggs

bearmeat.desc: A very manly slab of meat.

monstermeat.desc: A slab of abstract monster meat. This shouldn't exist, contact a coder about this if you are seeing it in-game.

mint.desc: Process for mint. Distill for menthol. No need to experi-mint.

meatpizzaslice.desc: A slice of a meaty pizza.

meatpie.desc: An old barber recipe, very delicious!

tomatomeat.desc: A slice from a huge tomato.

meatproduct.desc: A slab of reclaimed and chemically processed meat product.

pug.desc: Slightly less adorable in sliced form.
pug.name: pug meat

meatwheat.desc: Some blood-drenched wheat stalks. You can crush them into what passes for meat if you squint hard enough.

ham.desc: For when you need to go ham.

corgi.desc: Tastes like the Head of Personnel's hopes and dreams.

mashed_potatoes.desc: Some soft, creamy, and irresistible mashed potatoes.

margheritapizzaslice.desc: A slice of the classic pizza.
margheritapizzaslice.name: margherita slice

macpizzaslice.desc: A delicious slice of pizza topped with macaroni & cheese... wait, what the hell? Who would do this?!
macpizzaslice.name: mac 'n' cheese pizza slice

macncheese.desc: One of the most comforting foods in the world. Apparently.
macncheese.name: mac 'n' cheese

macaroni.desc: These are little twists of raw macaroni.
macaroni.name: macaroni twists

liquidfood.desc: A prepackaged grey slurry of all the essential nutrients for a spacefarer on the go. Should this be crunchy?
liquidfood.name: \improper LiquidFood ration

limecakeslice.desc: Just a slice of cake, it is enough for everyone.
limecakeslice.name: lime cake slice

lemoncakeslice.desc: Just a slice of cake, it is enough for everyone.
lemoncakeslice.name: lemon cake slice

lasagna.desc: Tajara love to eat this, for some reason.
lasagna.name: lasagna

jellysandwich.desc: You wish you had some peanut butter to go with this...
jellysandwich.name: jelly sandwich

jelliedtoast.desc: A slice of bread covered with delicious jam.
jelliedtoast.name: jellied toast

burger.desc: If you got this, something broke! Contact a coder if this somehow spawns.
burger.name: burger

hugemushroomslice.desc: A slice from a huge mushroom.
hugemushroomslice.name: huge mushroom slice

hotdog.desc: Not made with actual dogs. Hopefully.
hotdog.name: hotdog

killer.desc: I say to-mah-to, you say tom-mae-to... OH GOD IT'S EATING MY LEGS!!
killer.name: killer-tomato

tomato.desc: I say to-mah-to, you say tom-mae-to.
tomato.name: tomato

space.desc: Dry them out to make some space-smokes.
space.name: space tobacco leaves

tobacco.desc: Dry them out to make some smokes.
tobacco.name: tobacco leaves

tea.desc: These aromatic tips of the tea plant can be dried to make tea.
tea.name: Tea Aspera tips

soybeans.desc: It's pretty bland, but oh the possibilities...
soybeans.name: soybeans

eggy.desc: There MUST be a chicken inside.
eggy.name: Egg-plant

rice.desc: Crunchy rice deposits in delicious chocolate! A favorite of miners galaxy-wide.

poppy.desc: Long-used as a symbol of rest, peace, and death.
poppy.name: poppy

pineapple.desc: Pineapple syrup drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup.
pineapple.name: pineapple snowcone

peanuts.desc: Best avoided if you have spess allergies.
peanuts.name: patch of peanuts

olive.desc: A small cylindrical salty fruit closely related to mangoes. Can be ground into a paste and mixed with water to make quality oil.
olive.name: olive

nymph_pod.desc: A peculiar wriggling pod with a grown nymph inside. Crack it open to let the nymph out.

chanterelle.desc: Cantharellus Cibarius: These jolly yellow little shrooms sure look tasty!

moonflower.desc: Store in a location at least 50 yards away from werewolves.

icepepper.desc: It's a mutant strain of chili

holymelon.desc: The water within this melon has been blessed by some deity that's particularly fond of watermelon.
holymelon.name: holymelon

harebell.desc: \"I'll sweeten thy sad grave: thou shalt not lack the flower that's like thy face, pale primrose, nor the azured hare-bell, like thy veins; no, nor the leaf of eglantine, whom not to slander, out-sweeten'd not thy breath.\"
harebell.name: harebell

green.desc: It's not tainted meat, it's painted meat!
green.name: green pretty patty

ghost_chili.desc: It seems to be vibrating gently.

garlic.desc: Delicious, but with a potentially overwhelming odor.
garlic.name: garlic

comfrey.desc: Mash to turn into a poultice.

coffee.desc: A candy bean, guaranteed to not give you gas. It's Coffee flavored!
coffee.name: coffee jelly bean

lime.desc: Lime syrup drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup.

lemon.desc: Lemon syrup drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup.

citrus.desc: It's so sour, your face will twist.
citrus.name: citrus

chili.desc: It's spicy! Wait... IT'S BURNING ME!!
chili.name: chili

cherry_bomb.desc: You think you can hear the hissing of a tiny fuse.

ultimate.desc: You feel dizzy looking at it. What the fuck?

rainbow.desc: Taste the rainbow, eat the rainbow.

death.desc: Taste so good, you could die!

poison.desc: Light and fluffy, it's like eating a cloud made from sugar!

banana.desc: It's an excellent prop for a clown.

mushroom_stem.desc: A long mushroom stem. It's slightly glowing.

mushroom_cap.desc: The cap of a large mushroom.

cactus_fruit.desc: A cactus fruit covered in a thick, reddish skin. And some ash.

ash_flora.desc: Some shavings from a tall mushroom. With enough, might serve as a bowl.

gold.desc: Emblazoned upon the apple is the word 'Kallisti'.

apple.desc: Apple syrup drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup.

vulgaris.desc: This is a plant containing various healing chemicals.

deus.desc: Eating this makes you feel immortal!

aloe.desc: Mash to turn into a poultice.
aloe.name: aloe leaf

spacefreezy.desc: The best ice cream in space.

spacemountain.desc: Space Mountain Wind drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup.

honey.desc: Honey drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup.
honey.name: honey snowcone

grape.desc: Grape syrup drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup.

fruitsalad.desc: A delightful mix of citrus syrups drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup.

cola.desc: A candy bean, guaranteed to not give you gas. It's Cola flavored!
cola.name: cola jelly bean

bluecherry.desc: Bluecherry syrup drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup, how rare!

berry.desc: Berry syrup drizzled over a snowball in a paper cup.
berry.name: berry snowcone

snowcone.desc: It's just shaved ice. Still fun to chew on.

sea_salt.desc: This sky-blue ice-cream bar is flavoured with only the finest imported sea salt. Salty... no, sweet!

pineappletop.desc: A frozen treat made from tofu and pineapple juice blended smooth, then frozen. As seen on TV.

orangecream.desc: A classic orange creamsicle. A sunny frozen treat.

licoricecream.desc: A salty licorice ice cream. A salty frozen treat.
licoricecream.name: licorice creamsicle

frozenpineapple.desc: Few cultures love pineapple as much as the Martians, and this dessert proves that- frozen pineapple, on a stick, with just a little dunk of dark chocolate.
frozenpineapple.name: frozen pineapple pop

berrytop.desc: A frozen treat made from tofu and berry juice blended smooth, then frozen. Supposedly a favourite of bears, but that makes no sense...
berrytop.name: berry topsicle

berrycream.desc: A vibrant berry creamsicle. A berry good frozen treat.
berrycream.name: berry creamsicle

bananatop.desc: A frozen treat made from tofu and banana juice blended smooth, then frozen. Popular in rural Japan in the summer.
bananatop.name: banana topsicle

ant.desc: A colony of ants suspended in hardened sugar. Those things are dead, right?
ant.name: ant popsicle

popsicle.desc: A luxurious ice cream covered in rich chocolate. It seems smaller than you remember it being.
popsicle.name: jumbo icecream

peanutbuttermochi.desc: A classic dessert at the Arabia Street Night Market in Prospect, peanut butter ice cream mochi is made with a peanut-butter flavoured ice cream as the main filling, and coated in crushed peanuts in the Taiwanese tradition.
peanutbuttermochi.name: peanut butter ice cream mochi

icecreamsandwich.desc: Portable ice cream in its own packaging.
icecreamsandwich.name: icecream sandwich

cornuto.desc: A neapolitan vanilla and chocolate ice cream cone. It menaces with a sprinkling of caramelized nuts.
cornuto.name: cornuto

clowncakeslice.desc: A slice of bad jokes, and silly props.
clowncakeslice.name: clown cake slice

berryicecreamsandwich.desc: Portable ice cream in its own packaging.
berryicecreamsandwich.name: strawberry icecream sandwich

frozen.desc: If you got this, something broke! Contact a coder if this somehow spawns.
frozen.name: frozen treat

fries.desc: AKA: French Fries, Freedom Fries, etc.
fries.name: space fries

friedegg.desc: A fried egg, with a touch of salt and pepper.
friedegg.name: fried egg

friedbanana.desc: Goreng Pisang, also known as fried bananas.
friedbanana.name: fried banana

fried_tofu.desc: Proof that even vegetarians crave unhealthy foods.
fried_tofu.name: fried tofu

fried_shrimp.desc: Just one of the many things you can do with shrimp!
fried_shrimp.name: fried shrimp

fortunecookie.desc: A true prophecy in each cookie!
fortunecookie.name: fortune cookie

fishburger.desc: Almost like a carp is yelling somewhere... Give me back that fillet -o- carp, give me that carp.
fishburger.name: Fillet-O-Carp sandwich

fishandchips.desc: I do say so myself old chap. Indubitably!
fishandchips.name: fish and chips

fish_skewer.desc: A whole fish battered and grilled on a skewer. Hope you're hungry!
fish_skewer.name: fish skewer

firecrackerpizzaslice.desc: A spicy slice of something quite nice
firecrackerpizzaslice.name: firecracker pizza slice

feederfish.desc: A tiny feeder fish. Sure doesn't look very filling...
feederfish.name: feeder fish

eggplantparm.desc: The only good recipe for eggplant.
eggplantparm.name: eggplant parmigiana

watcher.desc: A lonely egg still pulsing with life, somehow untouched by the corruption of the Necropolis.
watcher.name: watcher egg

purple.desc: Regal and low class at the same time.
purple.name: purple pretty patty

ectoplasm.desc: A luminescent blob of what scientists refer to as 'ghost goo'.
ectoplasm.name: ectoplasm

doughslice.desc: The building block of an impressive dish.
doughslice.name: dough slice

chaos.desc: Like life, it never quite tastes the same.
chaos.name: chaos donut

donkpocket.desc: You wanna put a bangin-Oh nevermind.
donkpocket.name: donk pocket

dionaroast.desc: It's like an enormous leathery carrot... With an eye.
dionaroast.name: roast diona

deepfryholder.desc: If you can see this description the code for the deep fryer fucked up.
deepfryholder.name: Deep Fried Foods Holder Obj

sucker.desc: For being such a good sport!
sucker.name: sucker

jellybean.desc: A candy bean, guaranteed to not give you gas.
jellybean.name: jelly bean

jawbreaker.desc: An unbelievably hard candy. The name is fitting.
jawbreaker.name: jawbreaker

gummyworm.desc: An edible worm, made from gelatin.
gummyworm.name: gummy worm

gummybear.desc: A small edible bear. It's squishy and chewy!
gummybear.name: gummy bear

cotton.desc: Light and fluffy, it's like eating a cloud made from sugar!
cotton.name: cotton candy

coin.desc: Probably won't work in the vending machines.
coin.name: chocolate coin

candy.desc: It's placeholder flavored. This shouldn't be seen.
candy.name: generic candy

cubancarp.desc: A grifftastic sandwich that burns your tongue and then leaves it numb!
cubancarp.name: cuban carp

croissant.desc: Once a pastry reserved for the bourgeois, this flaky goodness is now on your table.
croissant.name: croissant

chocolatecakeslice.desc: Just a slice of cake, it is enough for everyone.
chocolatecakeslice.name: chocolate cake slice

choc_pile.desc: A pile of pure chocolate pieces.
choc_pile.name: pile of chocolate

sweetsourchickenball.desc: Is this chicken cooked? The odds are better than wok paper scissors.
sweetsourchickenball.name: sweet & sour chicken balls

cherrypie.desc: Taste so good, make a grown man cry.
cherrypie.name: cherry pie

cheesiehonkers.desc: Bite sized cheesie snacks that will honk all over your mouth.
cheesiehonkers.name: Cheesie Honkers

cheesewedge.desc: A wedge of delicious Cheddar. The cheese wheel it was cut from can't have gone far.
cheesewedge.name: cheese wedge

chawanmushi.desc: A legendary egg custard that makes friends out of enemies. Probably too hot for a cat to eat.
chawanmushi.name: chawanmushi

carrotcakeslice.desc: Carrotty slice of Carrot Cake, carrots are good for your eyes! Also not a lie.
carrotcakeslice.name: carrot cake slice

carpmeat.desc: A fillet of spess carp meat.
carpmeat.name: carp fillet

toffee.desc: Chocolate and toffee in the shape of a baton. Security sure knows how to pound these down!
toffee.name: Yum-Baton Bar

nougat.desc: Chocolate-covered nougat, shaped like a wrench. Great for an engineer on the go!
nougat.name: Tool-erone Bar

drgibb.desc: A candy bean, guaranteed to not give you gas. It's Dr. Gibb flavored!
drgibb.name: \improper Dr. Gibb jelly bean

chocolate.desc: A candy bean, guaranteed to not give you gas. It's chocolate!
chocolate.name: chocolate jelly bean

turtle.desc: Chocolate fudge with caramel and nuts. It doesn't contain real turtles, thankfully.
turtle.name: turtle fudge

peanut.desc: Chocolate fudge, with bits of peanuts mixed in. People with nut allergies shouldn't eat this.
peanut.name: peanut fudge

cookies_n_cream.desc: An extra creamy fudge with bits of real chocolate cookie mixed in. Crunchy!
cookies_n_cream.name: cookies 'n' cream fudge

fudge.desc: Chocolate fudge, a timeless classic treat.
fudge.name: fudge

donor.desc: A little treat for blood donors.
donor.name: donor candy

pink.desc: Light and fluffy, it's like eating a cloud made from sugar!
pink.name: pink cotton candy

bad_rainbow.desc: Light and fluffy, it's like eating a cloud made from sugar!
bad_rainbow.name: rainbow cotton candy

caramel_nougat.desc: An explosive combination of chocolate, caramel, and nougat. Research has never been so tasty!
caramel_nougat.name: Toxins Test Bar

caramel.desc: Chewy and dense, yet it practically melts in your mouth!
caramel.name: caramel

candybar.desc: A chocolate candybar, wrapped in a bit of foil.
candybar.name: candy

candy_corn.desc: It's a handful of candy corn. Cannot be stored in a detective's hat, alas.
candy_corn.name: candy corn

candiedapple.desc: An apple coated in sugary sweetness.
candiedapple.name: candied apple

burrito.desc: Meat, beans, cheese, and rice wrapped up as an easy-to-hold meal.
burrito.name: burrito

xeno.desc: Smells caustic and tastes like heresy.
xeno.name: xenoburger

superbite.desc: This is a mountain of a burger. FOOD!
superbite.name: SuperBite burger

plain.desc: The cornerstone of every nutritious breakfast.
plain.name: burger

mcrib.desc: An elusive rib shaped burger with limited availablity across the galaxy. Not as good as you remember it.
mcrib.name: mcRib

mcguffin.desc: A cheap and greasy imitation of an eggs benedict.
mcguffin.name: mcGuffin

hamborger.desc: Looking at this makes your flesh feel like a weakness.
hamborger.name: hamborger

ghost.desc: Spooky! It doesn't look very filling.
ghost.name: ghost burger

elec.desc: It's shockingly good, if you live off of electricity that is.
elec.name: empowered burger

crazy.desc: This looks like the sort of food that a demented clown in a trenchcoat would make.
crazy.name: crazy hamburger

cheese.desc: The cheese adds a good flavor.
cheese.name: cheeseburger

brain.desc: A strange looking burger. It appears almost sentient.
brain.name: brainburger

bigbite.desc: Forget the Big Mac, THIS is the future!
bigbite.name: BigBite burger

bacon.desc: It looks crispy and tastes amazing! Mmm... Bacon.
bacon.name: bacon

appendix.desc: An appendix which looks perfectly healthy.
appendix.name: appendix

bun.desc: The base for any self-respecting burger.
bun.name: bun

braincakeslice.desc: Lemme tell you something about brains. THEY'RE DELICIOUS.
braincakeslice.name: brain cake slice

boiledspiderleg.desc: A giant spider's leg that's still twitching after being cooked. Gross!
boiledspiderleg.name: boiled spider leg

boiledspaghetti.desc: A plain dish of noodles. This sucks.
boiledspaghetti.name: boiled spaghetti

boiledrice.desc: A boring dish of boring rice.
boiledrice.name: boiled rice

boiled_shrimp.desc: Just one of the many things you can do with shrimp!
boiled_shrimp.name: boiled shrimp

blt.desc: A classic bacon, lettuce, and tomato sandwich.
blt.name: \improper BLT

berryclafoutis.desc: No black birds, this is a good sign.
berryclafoutis.name: berry clafoutis

benedict.desc: There is only one egg on this, how rude.
benedict.name: eggs benedict

beans.desc: Musical fruit in a slightly less musical container.
beans.name: tin of beans

bbqribs.desc: Sweet, smokey, savory, and gets everywhere. Perfect for Grilling.
bbqribs.name: BBQ ribs

banarnarbreadslice.desc: A slice of delicious mah'weyh pleggh at e'ntrath!
banarnarbreadslice.name: banarnarbread slice

bananacakeslice.desc: Just a slice of cake, it is enough for everyone.
bananacakeslice.name: banana cake slice

bananabreadslice.desc: A slice of delicious banana bread.
bananabreadslice.name: banana-nut bread slice

badrecipe.desc: Someone should be demoted from chef for this.
badrecipe.name: burned mess

appletart.desc: A tasty dessert that won't make it through a metal detector.
appletart.name: golden apple streusel tart

applepie.desc: A pie containing sweet sweet love... or apple.
